Class Courses

  • @Path(value="/classes")
public class Courses
extends java.lang.Object
    End point service, this class implements all "classes" services provided by the app. The root context /ws/classes

      • find

        @GET
 @Path(value="find")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public java.util.List<Course> find(@QueryParam(value="title")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String description)
        Parameters:
        title -
        description -
        Returns:
        Find all courses that match with "firstName" or "description". If it is sent null for any of those parameters, the condition is ignored.
